workflow.name: 60-nfsserver
workflow.longdesc: Configure an NFS file system server. Requires that at least one LVM volume group running on a clustered DRBD resource has been previously configured.

parameters.stepdesc: Specify the ID of the LVM cluster resource.

parameter.name: lvmid
parameter.longdesc: ID of the LVM cluster resource used by the NFS server.

template.name: rootfs
template.stepdesc: A virtual file system root export. Only needed for NFSv4 clients.

template.name: virtual-ip
template.stepdesc: Configure a Virtual IP address used to access the NFS mounts.
